House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08118
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE SCHOOL HEALTH AND SAFETY OFFICE IN EVERY PUBLIC SCHOOL IN THE COUNTRY, PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Aims to address the health, safety, and security issues in different schools nationwide by creating the School Health and Safety Office, defining its roles, functions, responsibilities, and accountabilities.
ALIAS NAME : “School Health and Safety Act of 2018.”
